ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: a cup from a flowing spring passing round among them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: With cups from a flowing stream being passed around,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: a cup filled with wine from its springs, will be passed around to them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will be served with a cup full of crystal clear wine,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Cups of wine will be presented to them in rounds, from a spring flowing in front of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Round them will be passed a cup of pure wine
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: A bowl shall be made to go round them from water running out of springs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: a cup from a spring being passed round to them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: A cup from a gushing spring is brought round for them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: A drink will be passed round among them from a flowing spring:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Round shall be passed a cup Unto them filled with limpid drink:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: served around with a cup, from a clear fountain,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Round will be passed to them a Cup from a clear-flowing fountain,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Round them will be passed a cup of pure wine;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: a goblet from a spring shall be passed round to them
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will be offered a cup of pure drink.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: There will be circulated among them a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:45] they are served from all round, each one of them [is so served], with a cup (ka’san, [this denotes] the vessel with the drink in it) from a spring, of wine that flows along the ground like streams of water,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (A cup) of wine (from a gushing spring) of pure wine (is brought round for them) as service,
